name: Milfy Cases: Damsels in Distress
description:
Milfy Cases: Damsels in Distress main plot:
A recent college graduate, Chad (name customizable in English only) landed a sweet job chronicling the local ecology next to a modern cabin on the lake.
Then one stormy night, a fateful meeting changed everything. When Chad awoke, he was laying in a field, not far from his Landlady's house. Meeting with her is a local detective, investigating the tragedy that not only destroyed MC's rental, but everything he owned. Luckily, the attractive detective Jenny isn't pursing Chad as a suspect, and even better, Mary graciously allows MC to continue his rental agreement by taking a spare bedroom in her house.

That morning, he meets shy, bookish Alice his new younger roommate, and standoffish Sally, his new, slightly older roommate. With their help, can Chad get back on his feet and discover why his house was blown up? Or will the mysterious assailant try again and bring an untimely end to the hero before his journey concludes? Find out in his exciting adventure with romance, mystery, suspense, and mild elements of horror.

What's planned for Milfy Cases: Damsels in Distress:
A rich, detailed story line to explore with choices that influence the story.
Crisp, beautiful images rendered in glorious HD.
Music and sound effects that deepen the experience.
30FPS animations - both adult and nonadult.
Fully animated adult scenes with erotic sound effects that enhance the experience.
Fetishes / planned tags - F solo, M/F, M/F/F, F/F, F/F/F, lesbian, oral, harem, vaginal, anal, group, squirt, toys, voyeurism, spanking, domination, corruption, humor, first person POV, pregnancy).
Four Good Endings, one with each of the three love interests, and a harem ending as well.
